about.info: I`m Simamkele Tancu, a Full-Stack development student at Life Choices Academy.I initially wanted to focus on Front-end development, but now I enjoy full-stack because it allows me to work on all aspects of a project, from start to finish. My goal is to become a Professional full-stack developer, and I plan to achieve this by mastering both front-end and back-end development.

In addition to my technical skills, I`m also a great communicator and team paler. I`m comfortable giving presentations and am always eager to learn new things.I`m confident in my ability to adapt to new challenges and am excited to start my career as a full-stack developer.

education.description: I got my software Development Certificate

skills.title: Web Development
skills.experience: I have one year experience in web development using the following languages: HTML,CSS,Javascript and also open-source CSS framework Bootstrap.I`m still building websites and application using the mentioned technologies

skills.title: Programming
skills.experience: When it comes to programming, I have a lot to say, but I will be brief. Programming is the skills that will stay with me forever.

testimonials.name: Ntokozo
testimonials.quotes: Simamkele is bright student,  very enthusiastic about his work and those around him.Furthermore, Simamkele's positive attitude and excellent interpersonal skills make him a valuable team member who fosters a collaborative and productive work environment. Simamkele Tancu is undoubtedly a highly capable and driven individual, and I have no doubt that they will excel in any endeavor they pursue.

testimonials.name: Siseko
testimonials.quotes: I am delighted to recommend Simamkele Tancu, with whom I have had the privilege of working closely for the past two years. Simamkele is an exceptional individual with a strong work ethic, keen problem-solving abilities, and an unwavering commitment to their goals. During our time working together, I have been consistently impressed by Simamkele's dedication and ability to excel under pressure

testimonials.name: Shawn
testimonials.quotes: If you`re looking for a Front-End Developer , I hight recommend Simamkele Tancu. He`s always up to date on the latest technologies and is able to quickly learn new tools and techniques and he is also a great communicator and team player.

testimonials.name: Zubair
testimonials.quotes: I highly recommend Simamkele Tancu as a software developer. His technical expertise, commitment to quality, and strong communication skills make him an asset to any team. He is a quick learner and demonstrate exceptional attention to detail in every task he undertake. I look forward to the opportunity to work with him again in the future.
